info.title: SAP Emarsys Corporate Account
info.description: This API is used to create and update corporate account data and its related objects - (contact) relations and code lists. It supports extensible fields and code lists.

tags.name: Contact Relations
tags.description: A contact relation describes the connection between a corporate account and one or more contact persons.

tags.name: Employee Relations
tags.description: A employee relation describes the connection between a corporate account and one or more employee persons.

tags.name: Extensibility Identification Fields
tags.description: Extensibility Identification fields are custom fields that can be added to the corporate account root structure. It is used as an external system identifier.

tags.name: Extensibility Fields
tags.description: Extensibility fields are custom fields that can be added to the corporate account root structure.

tags.name: Extensibility Code Lists
tags.description: Extensibility Code Lists are custom Code Lists that can be used by extensibility fields.

accountIdField.description: Needs to contain the path and the field name of an External Account ID like e.g. identifications/c4cDisplayId
Needs to contain the path and the field name of an External Account ID like e.g. identifications/c4cDisplayId

@deleted.description: If true, the relation will be deleted physically.

oAuth2ClientCredentials.description: To use this API, you must first obtain an OAuth 2.0 client credentials token. After that you can use the token to call the API.

x-sap-shortText: The SAP Emarsys Corporate Account API helps you to import Corporate Accounts and their related objects (relations, codelists) into SAP Emarsys.
